Index.meta_description: Templify lets SaaS companies generate dynamic PDFs effortlessly using API and no-code templates. Fast, secure, and scalable document automation.

Hero.title: <important>Effortless </important> PDF Generation for SaaS Applications
Hero.subtitle: Building and managing PDF templates shouldn't be a headache. <important>Templify</important> lets you create, manage, and generate PDFs effortlessly—without maintaining complex libraries or writing custom code for every new template.
Hero.description1: Scalable, API-first infrastructure that handles PDF generation for you
Hero.description2: No huge dev effort needed for every new template
Hero.description3: No more maintaining bulky PDF libraries

Features.section_title: Unlock the Full Potential of the SaaS Template
Features.section_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.
Features.feature_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.

KeyFeatures.feature1_description: Drag & drop editor for non-devs, API-first for developers
KeyFeatures.feature3_description: Automate tables, lists, and form data
KeyFeatures.feature4_description: Built to handle high-volume PDF generation
KeyFeatures.feature6_description: Track past API usage over time and review detailed invocation history for transparency and debugging

Working.section_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.
Working.step1_description: Get started instantly with Google sign-in

step2_description.description_1: Drag & Drop HTML Builder – Create stunning templates without coding
step2_description.description_2: Handlebars Template Engine – Code-based templates with real-time previews & dynamic data suppor

Working.step3_description: Easily manage templates from your dashboard
Working.step4_description: Use the Template ID, along with your Client ID & Secret ID, to generate PDFs on demand
Working.step5_description: Receive the generated document instantly via API for use in your app

Challenges.title: Why Is Dynamic PDF Generation So Hard?
Challenges.subtitle: Challenges
Challenges.challenge1: Maintaining complex PDF generation libraries that require frequent updates and fixes
Challenges.challenge2: Building new PDFs from scratch every time a new format is needed
Challenges.challenge3: Scaling PDF generation without slowing down application performance

Reviews.review1: Templify saved us weeks of dev effort—no more dealing with PDF libraries! Now we generate invoices in seconds.
Reviews.review2: The Handlebars engine + live preview is a game-changer. Dynamic table rows, real-time updates—it’s exactly what we needed!
Reviews.review3: We needed scalability for high-volume PDF generation, and Templify delivered. Seamless API, zero maintenance!

SecurityFeatures.title: Trustworthy and reliable
SecurityFeatures.subtitle: Trust & Reliability
SecurityFeatures.description: Your data stays protected, and your PDFs generate instantly – every time.
SecurityFeatures.feature1_description: Secure API key authentication ensures only authorized users generate PDFs.
SecurityFeatures.feature3_description: Comprehensive API documentation + email support for developers.
SecurityFeatures.feature4_description: Auto-scaling infrastructure ensures high-speed PDF generation, even at peak loads.

Pricing.title: Simple & Transparent Pricing For The MVP Version
Pricing.subtitle: Pricing & Payment
Pricing.description: Get started with 150 free credits when you sign up!
Pricing.pricing_label1: Each PDF generation API call deducts 1 credit from your balance.
Pricing.pricing_label2: Once your credits are exhausted, you can contact us at support@templify.cloud to replenish your balance.
Pricing.pricing_label3: No hidden fees, no complicated pricing – just pay as you go.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Support
FAQ.description: Everything you need to know about Templify
FAQ.answer_1: Templify is an API-first SaaS that enables users to create and manage templates and dynamically generate PDFs without the need for complex PDF libraries or extensive development effort.
FAQ.question_2: How do I integrate Templify into my application?
FAQ.answer_2: Integration is simple! Sign up, create a template, obtain the Template ID, and call our API with your Client ID & Secret ID to generate PDFs instantly.
FAQ.question_3: What types of templates can I create?

answer_3.3: Handlebars Template Engine (for developers needing dynamic template generation)

FAQ.question_4: Is my data secure with Templify?
FAQ.answer_4: Yes! We use secure API key authentication and enforce encryption measures to keep your data protected.
FAQ.question_5: Can I track my past API usage?
FAQ.answer_5: Absolutely! Templify provides a time-series view of your past API calls and a detailed API invocation history for monitoring and debugging.
FAQ.question_6: What kind of support do you provide?
FAQ.answer_6: We offer comprehensive API documentation and email support to assist with any integration or usage issues.
FAQ.question_7: Is Templify scalable for high-volume PDF generation?
FAQ.answer_7: Yes! Our auto-scaling infrastructure ensures that even large-scale applications can generate PDFs quickly and reliably.

CTA.title: Stop Wasting Time On PDF Generation.
CTA.description: Let Templify handle it for you
CTA.button_text: Sign up now and create your first template in minutes!

DocsIntroduction.title: 1. Introduction
DocsIntroduction.description: Templify is an API-first SaaS that allows developers to create and manage templates and generate PDFs dynamically. This documentation provides the necessary details to integrate the Templify API seamlessly into your application.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At Templify, we prioritize the privacy and security of our users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

content.content1: <important>Account Information:</important>  Name, email, and login credentials.
content.content2: <important>Usage Data:</important> Logs, interactions, and service usage.
content.content3: <important>Payment Information:</important> Processed securely by third-party payment providers.

content.content1: To provide, improve, and maintain our services.
content.content2: To communicate updates, offers, and support-related information.
content.content3: To ensure security and prevent fraudulent activities.

content.content1: We do not sell or rent your data.
content.content2: We may share data with service providers for hosting, analytics, and payment processing.
content.content3: Data may be disclosed to comply with legal obligations.

content.content1: We implement industry-standard security practices to protect user data.
content.content2: Encrypted API keys and secure authentication mechanisms are in place.

content.content1: We retain data as long as necessary for service operation and compliance.
content.content2: Users may request data deletion at any time by contacting support.

content.content1: Access, update, or delete personal data.
content.content3: Request a copy of stored personal data.

content.content1: We may update this policy periodically and notify users of significant changes.
For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Templify! By accessing or using our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our services.

content.content1: <important>Templify</important>  refers to our SaaS platform providing template management and PDF generation.
content.content2: <important>User</important> refers to anyone accessing or using our services.
content.content3: <important>Service</important> refers to the Templify platform, including APIs, web applications, and related services.

content.content1: You must provide accurate and complete information during the registration process.
content.content2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
content.content3: Templify reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

content.content1: You may not use Templify for any illegal or unauthorized purposes
content.content2: You must not interfere with or disrupt the functionality of the platform.
content.content3: API usage must comply with our fair use policy.

content.content1: Certain features may require a paid subscription.
content.content2: Subscription fees are non-refundable unless stated otherwise.
content.content3: Templify reserves the right to update pricing with prior notice.

content.content1: Your data is processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
content.content2: We do not sell user data to third parties.

content.content1: Templify is provided 'as is' without any warranties
content.content2: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from service use

content.content1: We may update these terms at any time, with prior notice where applicable.
content.content2: Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of revised terms.

content.content1: For any questions about these terms, please contact us.
